ValidationRule.description: Ensures that only certain roles can be chosen for a primary group. At this stage, these are client, child, and deceased client. This is because these are the only roles that could define a primary advice relationship.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: !$Setup.SystemConfiguration__c.ValidationBypass__c && FinServ__PrimaryGroup__c && NOT(INCLUDES( Roles, "Client") || INCLUDES( Roles, "Child") || INCLUDES( Roles, "Deceased Client"))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Primary group can only be true where the role is client, child or deceased client.
